title: An Act relative to patient care access

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Galvin of Canton, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1705) of William C. Galvin relative to patient safety, medical error reporting and medical malpractice.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
